game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.beginning: In a world where time is broken, the fabric of reality is unraveling.
game.ending: As the last remnants of civilization fade away, you must find the hidden keys to repair the timestream and restore balance to the universe.
game.synopsis:
The land of Tenria, once a realm of wonder and magic, is crumbling into chaos. A cataclysmic event known as "The Great Dissonance" has shattered the flow of time, leaving behind only fragments of memories and forgotten lore.

You are an Echokeeper, tasked with tracking down the lost artifacts of the Ancients and restoring the timestream to its former glory. As you journey across realms both familiar and unknown, you'll encounter enigmatic allies, rival treasure hunters, and mysterious beings from other dimensions who will aid or hinder your quest.

Uncover the secrets behind The Great Dissonance and unravel the mysteries of Tenria's forgotten past to prevent the destruction of all that remains. With each step forward, the fate of eternity hangs in the balance.
